alert.note: Alert for Grapevine (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 3:45AM PST until December 15 at 12:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations one to three inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Grapevine, including the town of Lebec. * WHEN...From 10 AM Tuesday to Midnight PST Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and cause blowing snow and low visiblities.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
